messages.title: A STRONG VOICE FOR GATESHEAD
messages.content: Frank Hindle and the Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always fought for Britain's future in the European Union, and we are fighting for you to have an any final Brexit deal.

messages.title: CHANGE THE DIRECTION OF THE COUNTRY
messages.content: Only Frank Hindle and the Lib Dems are fighting to give you the final say on the Brexit deal.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrats will give you the final say on the Brexit deal, with the choice to remain in the EU.
We need additional investment in healthcare services as a matter of urgency and care services to meet future demands.
Local schools are under threat from a government that is spending money on the schools for the few. Frank is fighting for the many, ensuring that schools get the funds it needs.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Conservative Party now is the party of extreme hard Brexit. Theresa May is determined to take Britain out of the single market.

issues.brexitEurope: Liberal Democrats will give you the final say on the Brexit deal.
issues.education: We need additional investment in education and care services, Local schools are under threat from a government that is spending money on schools for the few.
issues.health: We need additional investment in healthcare services as a matter of urgency and care services.

contactInformation.address: Gateshead Liberal Democrats, FREPOST TYH-TRG-YULk, Gateshead, NE9 5XT

images.caption: Frank Hindle at the Gateshead Millennium Bridge.
